name: Necklace of Strength
description: A necklace that enhances the wearer's strength and melee damage.
looks: The necklace is made of a metallic chain with a pendant in the shape of a clenched fist.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy and sharp sword made of steel.
looks: The sword has a long, straight blade with a hilt wrapped in leather.

special_weapon_skils.sword_fighting: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

name: Slow Healing Potion
description: A potion that restores health points.
looks: A small, glass vial filled with a glowing, green liquid.

name: Speed Boots
description: Boots that enhance the wearer's movement speed.
looks: Sleek black boots with silver accents.

name: Mana Elixir
description: An elixir that restores a significant amount of mana.
looks: A small crystal vial filled with a sparkling blue liquid.

name: Speed Potion
description: A potion that grants increased speed and movement to the user.
looks: The potion is a small vial filled with a clear liquid that shimmers with a faint blue hue.

name: Fireball Staff
description: A powerful staff that can unleash fiery projectiles.
looks: The staff is made of dark wood and has a glowing red gem embedded at the top.

special_weapon_skils.Pyromancy: Allows the user to cast fire-based spells more effectively.

special_effects.Fire Mastery: Increases the damage of fire-based spells by 20%.

name: Strength Boosting Ring
description: A ring that enhances the wearer's strength.
looks: The ring is made of a polished silver metal and has a small enchanted ruby set in the center.

special_effects.Enhanced Strength: Increases the wearer's strength, allowing for more powerful melee attacks.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy steel sword crafted for battle.
looks: The sword has a silver hilt with intricate designs, and a sharp, gleaming steel blade.

special_weapon_skils.swordmanship: Increases damage and accuracy when using swords.

name: Fireball Staff
description: A staff that allows the user to cast fireball spells.
looks: A wooden staff with intricate carvings and a glowing red crystal at the top.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Allows the user to cast fire spells more efficiently.

special_effects.burning: Chance to set enemies on fire, dealing additional damage over time.

name: Lightning Axe
description: A powerful axe infused with lightning energy.
looks: The axe has a long handle made of dark wood, with a curved blade that crackles with electricity.

special_effects.Electric Charge: Has a chance to shock enemies with lightning damage.

name: Speed Potion
description: A potion that enhances the user's speed for a short period of time.
looks: The potion is a small glass vial filled with a shimmering silver liquid.

name: Magic Sword
description: A sword imbued with magical power.
looks: The sword has a long, silver blade with intricate engravings and a shining blue gem in the hilt.

special_effects.Magic Aura: Has a chance to deal additional magic damage on hit.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that contains the spell Fireball. When activated, it allows the user to cast a fireball at an enemy.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment with intricate runes and symbols inscribed on it.

special_effects.ignite: The fireball has a chance to set the target on fire, causing additional damage over time.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A powerful sword imbued with magical energy.
looks: The sword is made of gleaming silver with intricate engravings along the blade. It emits a faint glow.

special_weapon_skills.Sword Mastery: Increases damage and accuracy when using swords.

special_effects.Electric Surge: Has a chance to shock enemies with lightning damage.
